parameters:
"Luda Expedition Record 5" Independent Night Watch Nation
"Dawn's Ear" Expedition Allowance. Regarding the
reassignment of Mistress Suia and Seno.

"Luda Expedition Record 4" Independent Night Watch State
"Dawn's Ear" military stipend. Regarding the treatment of
courtesan Suia and Seno thereafter.

"Luda Expedition Record 1" - At the home of Orugi, the
former leader of the self-defense force, and his wife Seno,
in the independent night-watch nation "Dawn's Ear."

"Luda Expedition Record 2" Independent Night Watch State
"Dawn's Ear" Expedition Record. In the private chambers of
the Grand Duke and Princess Consort Suia.

"Marching Records of Luda 3" - Independent Night Watch
State "Dawn's Ear" military service records. Regarding
Princess Consort Suia and the self-defense corps member
Seno, as well as the handling of the remnants of defeated
soldiers.

\N<Luda Soldier>This is the archive where we store the records of Luda's
military campaigns. It contains records of engagements,
battle results, and even documents regarding prisoners of
war.

\N<Luda Soldier>Hmm... So you've succeeded in subduing the wanted criminal.
I shall promptly record this as a military achievement.

\N<Luda Soldier>You've done well. As a reward, I will grant you access to
peruse a portion of our Luda's records of military exploits
stored here.

\N<Luda Soldier>Continue to strive in the future. That is what gives value
to both you and the people of this city.

\N<Luda Soldier>This is the archive where we store the records of Luda's
military campaigns. It contains records of engagements,
battle results, and even documents regarding prisoners of
war.
